value.name: After dangerous Pomona chase is called off, 3 suspects allegedly carrying guns are found and arrested
value.description: Three men were jailed in Pomona Friday morning on gun and warrant violations after leading officers on a pursuit that was called off due to the erratic driving of the suspect.

value.name: Vallejo Police Department Watch Command log describes Monday protesters as ‘vulgar’ and ‘rude’
value.description: The Watch Commander log refers to the protestors as “hostile” and using “vulgar tones,” and that they “remained rude, angry, and threatening throughout the protest.”

value.name: This California city has a history of police using deadly force. Its first Black police chief looks toward reform
value.description: The string of fatal shootings by Vallejo officers, including the killing of 21-year-old Angel Ramos in 2017, led to protests as families of the deceased demanded answers and accountability ...
